entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.41.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where some Backspace presses with SwiftKey on Android would get interpreted as Enter.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.41.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Consistently set draggable on a node's inner DOM representation, not a decoration wrapper element.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.41.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure transformPasted is properly called when pasting into a code block.

Fix an issue where the editor didn't properly set the DOM selection in a shadow DOM on Safari in some situations.

Work around a Safari issue that broke composition right after changing the set of active marks.

New features

Pass an argument to transformPasted that tells the handler whether the paste is plain text. Call transformPasted when pasting into a code block

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.25.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug in Slice that made it possible for invalid ReplaceAroundSteps to be applied in some situations.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.40.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where, for some Android virtual keyboards, joining textblocks that contain an image with Backspace would run the handler for Enter instead.

Fix an issue causing posAtCoords to get confused by table cells sticking out of their parent row elements.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.25.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Suppress lint warnings about dereferencing methods by making Schema.nodeFromJSON and markFromJSON properties instead of methods.

Avoid using setAttribute("style", ...) to stay clear of content security policies.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.40.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Suppress lint warnings about dereferencing methods by making EditorView.dispatch a property instead of a method.

New features

The "handleTextInput" prop now takes an additional argument that can be used to generate the default transaction for that text change.

Widget decorations now support a relaxedSide option which can be used to allow the DOM cursor to appear at either side.

entry.title: prosemirror-changeset 2.3.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Improve diffing to not treat closing tokens of different node types as the same token.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.39.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where clicks using different mouse buttons could be grouped into a single double- or triple-click.

Only delete the selection when starting a composition when it crosses block boundaries.

entry.title: prosemirror-changeset 2.3.0
entry.content:
New features

Change sets can now be passed a custom token encoder that controls the way changed content is diffed.

entry.title: prosemirror-keymap 1.2.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the library was too eager to dispatch keys by key code when the character produced isn't ASCII.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.25.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make the DOM parser not discard nodes whose document representation cannot be placed inside the represenation of some parent DOM node.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.10.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that caused mapping ReplaceSteps to reset their structure flag.

Align removeNodeMark's behavior to that of removeMark. When passing in a node type, it now removes all occurrences of that type.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.39.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Default to using trustedTypes.defaultPolicy for clipboard input, when available.

Fix an issue where pasting multiple lines from the virtual keyboard on Android would have only the effect of an enter press.

entry.title: prosemirror-menu 1.2.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure the menu is re-rendered when the editor's root changes, so that it doesn't reference icons whose SVG lives in another root.

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.8.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure the drop cursor is positioned in the right place when the editor is scaled with a CSS transform.

Fix the width of the cursor when in a transformed element. Fix incorrect check in dragleave handler

Fix an issue where the dropcursor would hide when drag moved over the top editor element.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.7.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression in splitBlock that would cause it to crash, rather than return false, when no split is possible.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.39.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where, with some types of schemas, pressing Enter on Android with a Chinese keyboard wouldn't properly detect the Enter press.

New features

The new dragCopies prop can be used to configure whether a drag event inside the editor copies or moves content.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.25.0
entry.content:
New features

Mark specs can now be marked with a code property.

entry.title: prosemirror-inputrules 1.5.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where input rules behaved incorrectly when text input inserted multiple characters and only a part of those were matched by a rule.

Set inCodeMark to false for emdash and quote input rules.

New features

Input rules now take an inCodeMark option that can be used to turn them off inside marks marked as code.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-basic 1.2.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add a code flag to the code mark.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.13.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add a code flag to the code mark.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.10.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure Mapping.appendMap doesn't mutate shared arrays passed to its constructor.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.38.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression in 1.38.0 that breaks scrolling back to the selection after Chrome tries to reset it on focus.

Remove some internally used types from the public type declaration files. Include file extension in web test local imports

Fix an issue where scrolling the cursor into view could inappropriately scroll parent nodes of absolutely positioned elements.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.5.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where liftListItem would, in some circumstances, join lists of different types when they ended up on the same level.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.7.0
entry.content:
New features

toggleMark now accepts an includeWhitespace option that controls whether it affects leading/trailing space.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.38.0
entry.content:
New features

The clipboard serialization logic is now available as a serializeToClipboard method on the view object.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.37.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that caused EditorView.nodeDOM to sometimes not return a DOM node when querying a node next to a widget.

Fix an issue where an editor would, when scrolling the selection into view, try to do so even if the selection wasn't in that editor.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.37.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where display: content elements could break posAtCoords.

Work around an issue with Chrome reporting the selection incorrectly during composition.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.24.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

The parser now automatically preserves whitespace inside <pre> or white-space: pre elements.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.5.0
entry.content:
New features

The new wrapRangeInList function provides the implementation of the wrapInList command as a more flexible function.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.24.0
entry.content:
New features

Fragment.content and Node.children now expose a node's set of children as an array.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.37.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue on Safari where the (incorrect) top-level selection was used, instead of the workaround that also works inside shadow roots.

New features

Mark views can now provide an ignoreMutation method. Add ViewMutationRecord to doc template

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.36.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Don't recreated TrustedTypePolicy objects for every paste.

New features

Add support for a destroy method on custom mark views. Add MarkView to the doc template

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.35.0
entry.content:
New features

The new NodeView.multiType flag is now required to opt into handling different node types in a single node view. It used to be the default, but this tripped too many people up.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.6.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make splitBlock smart enough to split blocks when the cursor is inside a nested inline node.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.10.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Allow Transform.join to clear incompatible inline content from the node after the join.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.6.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

joinBackward will, when moving a node into a block, no longer join that block with the block after when the two have compatible content but aren't of the same type.

Fix an issue in splitBlock that caused it to return true without doing anything when the schema makes splitting at the cursor impossible.

Support implicit conversion between hard break nodes and newlines in the joinForward and joinBackward commands.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.10.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where a deleteRange heuristic could produce unexpected deletion shapes.

Make Transform.join convert between newlines and line break replacement nodes when necessary.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.23.0
entry.content:
New features

The new NodeType.isInGroup method can be used to query group membership.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.13.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a type error caused by use of an older markdown-it type package.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.34.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue that would, during some types of document updates, leave the document DOM in an improper form.

Handle the case where drag-selecting in Firefox creates a selection with multiple distinct ranges.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.34.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix pasting in Chrome with the require-trusted-types-for CSP enabled.

Fix an issue where, for some kinds of IME on Windows, pressing Enter while in a composition would execute the resulting command on the wrong selection, erasing some typed content.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.34.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix null dereferences caused by the behavior of Chrome's newly supported caretPositionFromPoint method.

Fix an issue where on Android, with GBoard, enter presses in code blocks while a spell correction was selected didn't insert a new line.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.34.0
entry.content:
New features

The DecorationGroup interface now has a forEachSet method to iterate though the contained decoration sets.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.11
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Delete the selection on composition start when on a mark boundary to force Chrome to apply the correct style to the composition.

When the browser starts a composition and the selection spans across blocks, start by clearing it to make sure the composed text node lands in a valid position.

entry.title: prosemirror-example-setup 1.2.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make the type of the fullMenu option MenuElement[][] instead of MenuItem[][].

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.10.0
entry.content:
New features

setBlockType can now take a function that computes attributes for the new nodes, instead of a static attribute object.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.10
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Prevent triple clicks and clicks on atom nodes from dispatching a selection update when the new selection is equal to the current selection.

Don't crash when window.getSelection() returns null.

Create a cursor wrapper when starting a composition with a selection that spans mark boundaries, to avoid odd DOM forms created by Chrome in such a situation.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.22.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix some corner cases in the way the DOM parser tracks active marks.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.6.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where joinBackward couldn't lift the block with the cursor when the block before it was isolating.

New features

toggleMark now takes an option that controls its behavior when only part of the selection has the mark already.

The function given to splitBlockAs now has access to the split position via a third parameter.

toggleMark now takes an enterInlineAtoms option that controls whether it descends into atom nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.22.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make attribute validation messages more informative.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.9
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where dragging an image on Chrome versions before 121 failed to put the image file in the clipboard data.

Enable cross-site scripting protection hack when rendering nodes and marks inside the editor.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.22.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add code to DOMSerializer that rejects DOM output specs when they originate from attribute values, to protect against XSS attacks that use corrupt attribute input.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.22.0
entry.content:
New features

Attribute specs now support a validate property that can be used to provide a validation function for the attribute, to guard against corrupt JSON input.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-basic 1.2.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add attribute type validation for headings, images, and link marks.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.4.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add attribute type validation for ordered list nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-history 1.4.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where mark steps could cause the history to treat otherwise adjacent changes as non-adjacent, and start superfluous new undo events.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.21.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where parse rules for CSS properties that were shorthands for a number of more detailed properties weren't matching properly.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.21.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure resolved positions (and thus the document and schema hanging off them) don't get kept in the cache when their document can be garbage-collected.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.8
entry.content:
Bug fixes

When composition happens with the cursor between two text nodes, use the last mutated one to guess which one is being changed.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.4.0
entry.content:
New features

The new splitListItemKeepMarks command can be used like splitListItem but will keep the active marks from the original item.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.21.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Improve performance and accuracy of DOMParser style matching by using the DOM's own style object.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Ignore stray <br> nodes added to parent list elements when backspacing near uneditable content in Firefox.

Fix a crash where the editor tried to call removeAttribute on a text node.

Fix an issue where coordinates near nested blocks could inappropriately be assigned to be inside those blocks.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.13.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix the type of MarkdownParser.parse to be non-nullable. Add a strict option to MarkdownSerializer

New features

The new strict option to MarkdownSerializer makes it possible to make the serializer ignore node and mark types it doesn't know.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.21.0
entry.content:
New features

The new linebreakReplacement property on node specs makes it possible to configure a node type that setBlockType will convert to and from line breaks when appropriate.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.9.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue in ReplaceAroundStep.map that broke mapping steps that wrapped content over steps that inserted content at the start of the step.

New features

setBlockMarkup now uses the linebreak equivalent node defined in the schema.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure the content slice stored for an in-editor drag is the one that was transformed by transformCopied.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression in composition handling in 1.33.3 that occurs for some IMEs when starting composition on an empty line.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.20.0
entry.content:
New features

The ParseRule type is now a union of TagParseRule and StyleParseRule, with more specific types being used when appropriate.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

When available, use Selection.getComposedRanges on Safari to find the selection inside a shadow DOM.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Further improve preserving of compositions for IME systems that keep the cursor before the composed text.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Improve Android backspace detection when the native effect is to delete an entire block element.

Fix a bug where reconfiguring node views caused the editor to lose focus.

Fix an issue where some commands didn't properly scroll the cursor into view on Mobile Safari.

Fix a bug where starting a composition with stored marks or after a noninclusive mark, with an IME that keeps the cursor at the start of the composed text (like many Chinese IMEs) disrupted composition on Chrome.

Fix a memory leak where a (single) destroyed editor could be kept alive through a reused Range object.

entry.title: prosemirror-history 1.4.0
entry.content:
New features

Add undoNoScroll/redoNoScroll commands.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a type error in the published type declarations in 1.33.0.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.33.0
entry.content:
New features

The DecorationSource.forChild method is now public.

entry.title: prosemirror-inputrules 1.4.0
entry.content:
New features

Input rules now take an inCode option that controls whether they should apply inside nodes marked as code.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression that caused widget decorations directly after a node to not get drawn in some situations.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.19.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make textBetween emit block separators for empty textblocks.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.12.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Block-level markup inside a heading is no longer escaped by the serializer.

Do not backslash-escape a + at the start of line when it isn't followed by a space. Upgrade to markdown-it 14

New features

MarkdownSerializerState.renderInline now takes a parameter that controls whether block-level markup should be escaped.

Upgrade to markdown-it version 14, which provides ES modules.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that could cause view updates to crash in rare situations where inline nodes were added around decorations.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug in DecorationSet.map that, in specific cases when mapping through groups of changes, move decorations to the wrong position.

entry.title: prosemirror-inputrules 1.3.0
entry.content:
New features

Input rules can now be set to be non-undoable, preventing undoInputRule from rolling them back.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a case where a DOM change involving astal characters could create odd steps that started and ended in the middle of UTF16 surrogate pairs.

Dragging a draggable node will no longer implicitly select it.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where, in some situations, pasting plain text pasted HTML markup.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Check for text/uri-list data on the clipboard or in the drop event when pasting or dropping content, since some types of copying on Apple devices use this format.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Work around a Chrome issue where it didn't draw a selection for inline leaf nodes when selecting across them.

Override the native behavior when shift-selecting horizontally across non-text inline nodes, since most browsers behave poorly here.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.8.0
entry.content:
New features

The new DocAttrStep can be used to set attributes on the document's top node.

Transform.setDocAttribute can be used to create a DocAttrStep in a transform.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.32.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Work around an issue on Chrome where, when clicking above the right side of an uneditable node, the cursor would be put after the node.

Fix a bug that could corrupt the composition when it occurs next to text identical to the composed characters.

New features

The new EditorView.updateRoot method can be used to make the editor update its DOM root when it is moved to a new document or shadow tree.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.8
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that broke arrow motion near uneditable nodes on Chrome in some situations.

Fix an issue that broke backspace at the end of a textblock that ended in a newline on Chrome.

Fix a crash in the way inline decorations that ended right after a node end position were drawn.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.7.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a failure in replaceRange to drop wrapper nodes when the same wrapper is already present.

entry.title: prosemirror-menu 1.2.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where icon creation crashed because it couldn't find a Document value.

entry.title: prosemirror-menu 1.2.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Don't directly use the global window/document, to fix use in a different frame or shadow root.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.11.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix some unnecessary escapes for period characters in Markdown serialization.

Only escape # signs if they would otherwise create a heading. Add a test for headings in list items

Fix a bug in MarkdownSerializer that broken expelling of whitespace from marks when the mark spanned multiple nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.7.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

When using setBlockType to convert a code block to a type of node that doesn't contain code, replace newlines with spaces.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where, when a compositionend event was received before the composition's final changes were processed, the resulting transaction didn't have its composition metadata set.

Fix an issue that caused cursor motion to stop at uneditable nodes that aren't widget decorations.

When scrolling an element higher than the viewport into view, make sure its top is visible.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that caused posAtCoords to return incorrect results for coordinates over inline-decorated text.

Don't try to scroll fixed-positioned elements into view by scrolling their parent elements.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.19.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Don't apply style parse rules for nodes that are skipped by other parse rules.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.11.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Allow any blocks as first child of list items to align with what Markdown itself does.

Add parse rules that clear strong and em marks when inline CSS resets it.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where the editor accidentally blocked shift-delete when the whole document is selected.

Bring back workaround for an issue where Firefox draws the cursor in the wrong place in a code block.

Fix an issue where Shift-Insert pastes pasted plain text (because Shift was being held).

Fix an issue where selecting across paragraph and starting a composition would update the state as if Enter was pressed and disrupt the composition.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.7.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug in canSplit that made it interpret the typesAfter argument incorrectly on splits of depth greater than 1.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.3.0
entry.content:
New features

splitListItem now takes an optional second argument to set the attributes of the new list item node. Rename parameter

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure destroy is called on node views that are replaced by changing a node's markup.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.19.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Allow parse rules with a clearMark directive to clear marks that have already been applied.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.19.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix the types of Fragment.desendants to include the index parameter to the callback. Add release note

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue that could cause the clipboard parser to create invalid slices when parsing content containing isolating nodes.

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.5.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-gapcursor 1.3.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-basic 1.2.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.2.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-menu 1.2.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-example-setup 1.2.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.11.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure blank lines at the end of code blocks are properly serialized.

Convert soft breaks (single newlines) in Markdown to spaces, rather than newlines in the ProseMirror document, because newlines tend to behave awkwardly in the editor.

Fix a bug that cause the object passed as configuration to MarkdownSerializer to be mutated. Add release note

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

New features

A new option to MarkdownSerializer allows client code to configure which node type should be treated as hard breaks during mark serialization. Remove the extra left bracket

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.8.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-test-builder 1.1.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make the return type of `builders` include properties for schema node/mark names.

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-changeset 2.2.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Include CommonJS type declarations in the package to please new TypeScript resolution settings.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that broke backspace after empty lines in code blocks on Firefox.

Make it possible for the attributes prop to override the translate attribute.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that could cause a view crash on some kind of document updates.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.31.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where, when the browser failed to return a cursor for a set of coordinates (as in a shadow root in Chrome) the library's own algorithm worked poorly for coordinates between lines in a textblock.

Improve performance of changing a parent node (by type or attributes) without modifying its children by reusing the DOM of the child nodes.

Fix an issue where, in right-to-left context, the left and right arrow keys could get stuck on a selectable leaf node because the editor was moving the selection in the wrong direction.

Fix a regression in coordsAtPos when querying the position of a line wrap.

New features

Attach a "composition" meta field to transactions generated from DOM changes.

entry.title: prosemirror-history 1.3.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where, if a composition moved the selection, it might get split across multiple undo events.

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.8.0
entry.content:
New features

If the color option is set to false, the library will not assign an explicit color to the cursor.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.30.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where posAtCoords could incorrectly return positions outside of a table when querying a coordinate inside it.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.2.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add a workaround for a bug on macOS where Ctrl-a and Ctrl-e getting stuck at the edge of inline nodes.

The new selectTextblockEnd and selectTextblockStart commands move the cursor to the start/end of the textblock, when inside one.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.23.6

Upgrade markdown-it to version 12.

Use the whitespace node prop where appropriate.

entry.title: prosemirror-gapcursor 1.2.1

The clipboard parser will no longer drop trailing <br> nodes that appear in an inline parent element.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.23.2

Avoid some unnecessary node redraws when marks are present in sibling nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.4.0

Bug fixes

Widget decorations now accept a destroy option, which will be called when the widget is removed from the view.

Fix issue where recent Mobile Safari versions weren't treated as Mac platforms.

Bug fixes

Go back to regular dependencies, so that the package works on NPM <7.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.20.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash when pasting whitespace-only content as text.

Fix an issue in autoJoin that made it ignore a third argument if it was passed one.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.3.3

Bug fixes

Fix an inconsistency in deleteRange where it would delete the parent node for ranges covering all textblocks in a given parent.

Bug fixes

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.20.0

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.19.1

Fix flaky behavior when starting a composition with a selection that spans multiple blocks.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.18.10

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.18.6

Fix an issue where a race condition could leave a node uneditable when clicked.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

DOM parsing with preserveWhitespace: "full" will no longer ignore whitespace-only nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.18.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where, when pressing enter or space at the start of a composition, the cursor would jump to the end of the composition on Chrome Android.

Fix an issue that would cause Enter presses to be dropped on Android when in a node whose DOM representation nested more than one element.

Fix a bug where pasting specific types of HTML could cause a crash.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.14.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Node.check will now error if a node has an invalid combination of marks.

Don't leave carriage return characters in parsed DOM content, since they confuse Chrome's cursor motion.

New features

Fragment.textBetween is now public.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.3.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression in dropPoint that caused it to dereference undefined in some circumstances.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.3.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash in Transform.replaceRange when called with under specific circumstances.

Fix an issue where dropPoint could return an invalid drop point.

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.3.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Hide the drop cursor when dropPoint doesn't return a position.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.3.0
entry.content:
New features

The various properties of subclasses of Step (ReplaceStep, ReplaceAroundStep, AddMarkStep, and RemoveMarkStep) are now part of the public interface.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.18.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Properly handle CSS class name strings with extra spaces in decorations.

Fix a performance bug when updating nodes with thousands of children.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.18.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix the scrolling-into-view logic in the case where a scale transformation is applied to the editor. Strip carriage return chars from text pasted as code

Remove carriage return characters when pasting text into code blocks.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.18.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash in posAtDOM.

New features

Node view constructors and update methods are now passed the inner decorations of the node.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.8
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where some user actions (such as enter on iOS) in a node whose content DOM element isn't it's top element could leave the DOM in a damaged state.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the ProseMirror-hideselection element class would be briefly removed and then restored when moving from one invisible selection to another.

Fix an issue where the cursor could end up on the wrong side of a widget with side < 0.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.1.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression where createParagraphNear no longer fired for gap cursor selections.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.12
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where merging replace steps with the structure flag could create steps that couldn't be applied.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where using the vertical arrow keys after select-all didn't update the selection.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.1.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Improve behavior of enter when the entire document is selected.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.11
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue in Transform.removeMark where the mark type was passed through to be removed instead of the mark itself.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.10
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where Transform.removeMark, when given a mark type, would only remove the first instance from nodes that had multiple marks of the type.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the view could go into an endless DOM flush loop in specific circumstances involving asynchronous DOM mutation.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.13.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where nested tags that match mark parser rules could cause the parser to apply marks in invalid places.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.13.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

MarkType.removeFromSet now removes all instances of the mark, not just the first one.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Add another kludge to work around an issue where Firefox displays the cursor in the wrong place in code blocks.

Fix a bug where validation of decorations passed to DecorationSet.add sometimes passed the wrong offsets to the validator.

Fix bad selection position in empty textblocks. Solves several issues with editing in Firefox Android.

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.3.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix drop cursor positioning when the editor's offsetParent has been scrolled.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where adding invalid decorations (for example zero-length inline decorations) with DecorationSet.add would fail to drop those.

entry.title: prosemirror-state 1.3.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Remove (broken, poorly conceptualized) schema option to EditorState.reconfigure.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.9
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where AddMarkStep would mark inline nodes with content.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.1.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

joinBackward and joinForward will now, when the textblock after the cut can't be moved into the structure before the cut, try to just join the inline content onto the last child in the structure before the cut.

toggleMark will now skip whitespace at the start and end of the selection when adding a mark.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

The library will now always let the browser perform its native pasting behavior when the clipboard data is empty and no paste handler handles the event.

Fix a bug where domAtPos (and thus cursor placement) would pick positions inside uneditable DOM or atom nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression in coordsAtPos when used on an empty line at the end of a code block.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.17.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where starting a composition with stored marks would sometimes create the wrong steps (and thus break the mark) on Chrome.

New features

EditorView.domAtPos now takes a second parameter that can be used to control whether it should enter DOM nodes on the side of the given position.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.5.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

The Markdown parser will now correctly set the tight attribute on list nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.13.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where nested marks of the same type would be applied to the wrong node when parsing from DOM.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.13.0
entry.content:
New features

Parse rules can now have a consuming: false property which allows other rules to match their tag or style even when they apply.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.16.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix platform detection on recent iPadOS versions, restoring several workarounds for bugs that were accidentally turned off there.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.16.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the cursor ended up in the wrong place when pressing enter in an empty heading on iOS.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.16.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where pressing enter at the start of a line in a code block would leave the visible cursor in the wrong place on Firefox.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.16.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where overlapping inline decorations would get drawn incorrectly (and even corrupt the drawing of unrelated content).

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.16.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the attributes of defining nodes were dropped when copying to the clipboard.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.12.0
entry.content:
New features

The output of toDOM functions can now be a {dom, contentDOM} object specifying the precise parent and content DOM elements.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.16.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where a drag starting briefly after an aborted drag could confuse the view and break the second drag. Allow callers of coordsAtPos to specify a side

New features

EditorView.coordsAtPos now takes a side argument that determines which side of the position to look, if ambiguous.

entry.title: prosemirror-inputrules 1.1.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix crash when undoing input rules when the rule was triggered without inserting text.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.11.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix issue where 1.11.1 uses an array method not available on Internet Explorer.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.11.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where an inner node's mark information could reset the same mark provided by an outer node in the DOM parser.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where, when inserting <br> nodes, Safari would briefly show the cursor before the inserted break, though the DOM selection had already been set after it.

When dragging inside the editor, whether the operation copies or moves is now determined by the modifiers held on drop, not on drag start.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix issue where the DOM selection could end up in an invalid state after a keyboard cursor motion event that had no effect.

Fix an issue where some types of drop events would fail to select the dropped content.

Work around Safari issues when pressing shift-down with the cursor before an uneditable element.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where mapping a decoration set could corrupt the decoration positions in specific cases.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash that occurred when inline decorations covered inline nodes that weren't leaf nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.8
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where fitting a slice at the top level of the document would, in some circumstances, crash.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Work around a Firefox issue where the cursor is sometimes shown in the wrong place when directly after a <br> node.

The editor will now reset composition when stored marks are set on the state, so that the marks can be added to the next input.

Inline decorations are no longer applied to inline nodes that aren't leaves, only to the innermost layer.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.1.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression where liftListItem couldn't lift a paragraph from the end of a composite list item.

entry.title: prosemirror-schema-list 1.1.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where splitListItem could delete other content in the item when pressing enter in an empty paragraph that had other content below it in a list item.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.5.0
entry.content:
New features

Markdown parse specs can now be specified as noCloseToken, which will cause the parser to treat them as a single token, rather than a pair of _open/_close tokens.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where in some cases replace fitting would insert an additional bogus node when fitting content into nodes with strict content restrictions.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Adjust the workaround for Chrome's DOM selection corruption bug to cover more cases.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Work around another issue where Chrome misreports the DOM selection.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.11.0
entry.content:
New features

Resolved positions have a new convenience method, posAtIndex, which can resolve a depth and index to a position.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.10.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug that prevented non-canonical list structure from being normalized.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.15.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where Enter on iOS might be handled twice on slow devices. Pass plain text flag to transformPastedText and clipboardTextParser props

Fix a bug where typing in front of a mark could in some circumstances cause the editor to discard the new content.

New features

The transformPastedText and clipboardTextParser props now receive an extra argument, plain, indicating whether the paste was forced as plain text.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where creating a replace step would sometimes fail due to unmatchable close tokens after the replaced range.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.13
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a bug where storing DOM nodes directly in widget decorations (not recommended) could cause the view to try and place the same DOM node multiple times.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.12
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash when the editor tries to read a DOM selection outside of itself.

Improve the way inline decorations covering non-leaf inline nodes are rendered. Ensure elt is defined before accessing it in posAtCoords

Fix a crash in Safari when the browser's elementFromPoint returns null in posAtCoords. Handle case where Chrome flips the nesting order of edited inline nodes

Fix the issue of <a> marks on decorated text being lost during editing because Chrome changes the nesting order of the link and the decoration <span> element in the DOM.

Fix an issue where, when pressing enter with a bolded virtual keyboard suggestion on Android's Gboard, the cursor would stay on the wrong line.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.10.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Avoid fixing directly nested list nodes during DOM parsing when it looks like the schema allows those.

New features

DOM parser rules can now specify closeParent: true to have the effect of closing their parent node when matched.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.11
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix bug in the way the editor handles Cmd-arrow presses on macOS.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.10
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the editor would override behavior for Cmd-arrow key presses on macOS the wrong way in some situations.

Fix handling of copy and paste in IE when top-level elements can't be focused.

entry.title: prosemirror-keymap 1.1.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fall through to the name associated with a key's keyCode when the character produced isn't ASCII and isn't directly bound.

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.4.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Don't allow hard_break nodes in headings.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.9
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash on IE, which sets document.activeElement to null in some circumstances.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.8
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Work around an issue in Safari where you couldn't click inside a selected element to put the cursor there.

Fix enter at start of paragraph in iOS inserting two new paragraphs.

Scrolling the cursor into view now makes sure it doesn't end up below a scrollbar.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.7
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash on Chrome during selection updates when Selection.collapse inexplicably leaves the selection empty. Update documented type for handlePaste event arg

Fix another issue that could break decoration set mapping in deeply nested nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Rewrite the slice-fitting code used by replaceStep to handle a few more corner cases.

entry.title: prosemirror-commands 1.1.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

selectNodeForward and selectNodeBackward will now also select nodes next to a gap cursor (or other custom empty selection type).

entry.title: prosemirror-gapcursor 1.1.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue where the gap cursor plugin would sometimes cause perfectly selectable content to be skipped when moving the selection with the arrow keys.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.6
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix superfluous cursor showing up in Chrome when there is a gap cursor or similar custom empty selection active.

Fix an issue where DecorationSet.remove would ignore the positions of its argument decorations, and only compare by type.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Work around Chrome Android issue where pasting would close the virtual keyboard.

Fix an issue where some kinds of changes would cause nodes to show up twice in the DOM.

entry.title: prosemirror-gapcursor 1.1.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Improve behavior around unselectable block nodes.

entry.title: prosemirror-state 1.3.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

When deleting a whole-document-selection causes default content to be generated, make sure the selection is moved to the start of the document.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Improve return values from coordsAtPos on line breaks in Safari and Firefox.

Make sure enter on iOS is handled even when the native behavior has no effect.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix mismatch between DOM and state selection bug at compositionend in IE11.

Make sure handleDrop](https://prosemirror.net/docs/ref/#view.EditorProps.handleDrop) is called even when there's nothing on the clipboard.

Fix a bug where reconfiguring a view in a way that changed both the active node views and the attributes of the top node left the old attributes active.

Work around another case where Chrome lies to the script about its current DOM selection state.

Avoid redrawing nodes when both their content and a widget in front of them is updated in the same transaction.

Fix issue where scrolling with multiple scrollable containers sometimes moves to the wrong position.

entry.title: prosemirror-menu 1.1.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Restore compatibility with IE11.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.2.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix joinPoint to return check whether the parent node allows a given join.

entry.title: prosemirror-menu 1.1.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Update crel dependency to a version that exposes an ES module.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix bug when starting a composition after a link, when the composition started with the character that ended the link.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix issue where scrolling the cursor into view in a scrollable editor would sometimes inappropriately scroll an outer container as well.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.14.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix parsing of tbody, tfoot, and caption elements in pasted HTML content. Fix bug in selection-is-at-edge check

Fix an issue where moving focus to the editor with the keyboard or the DOM focus method would leave the DOM and state selections inconsistent.

New features

Widget decorations can now take an ignoreSelection option, that causes the editor to leave selections inside them alone.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.13.11
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix an issue that could lead to the editor making regular content uneditable on Safari.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.13.10
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash on Firefox when starting a composition after a marked non-text node.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.13.9
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Make sure to reset the selection when the browser moves it into an uneditable node.

Fix issue where the editor would fail to create a meaningful DOM selection for a node selection on Safari.

Makes sure the iOS virtual keyboard gets its internal state (autocorrection, autocapitalization) updated when the user presses enter.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Rename ES module files to use a .js extension, since Webpack gets confused by .mjs

entry.content:
Bug fixes

entry.title: prosemirror-gapcursor 1.1.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a crash in documents that have a textblock as top node.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.9.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Marks found in the DOM at the wrong level (for example, a bold style on a block node) are now properly moved to the node content.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.9.0
entry.content:
New features

The NodeType method hasRequiredAttrs is now public.

Element and attribute names in DOMOutputSpec structures can now contain namespaces.

Fix an issue where, since version 1.7.4 of prosemirror-model, splitBlock fails to create the expected new textblock in some schemas.

entry.content:
Bug fixes

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.4.3
entry.content:

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.13.7

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.13.6
entry.content:

Work around another case where Chrome reports an incorrect selection.

Work around issue where Firefox will insert a stray BR node when deleting a text node in some types of DOM structure.

entry.title: prosemirror-history 1.1.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes

entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix the way decorations update node styles to allow removing CSS custom properties. Link to https in readme and changelog

Fix an issue where the DOM selection could get out of sync with ProseMirror's selection state in Edge.

entry.title: prosemirror-changeset 2.0.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Solves various cases where complicated edits could corrupt the set of changes due to the mapped positions of deletions not agreeing with the mapped positions of insertions.

New features

Moves to a more efficient diffing algorithm (Meyers), so that large replacements can be accurately diffed using reasonable time and memory.

You can now find the original document given to a ChangeSet with its startDoc accessor.

Breaking changes

The way change data is stored in ChangeSet objects works differently in this version. Instead of keeping deletions and insertions in separate arrays, the object holds an array of changes, which cover all the changed regions between the old and new document. Each change has start and end positions in both the old and the new document, and contains arrays of insertions and deletions within it.

This representation avoids a bunch of consistency problems that existed in the old approach, where keeping positions coherent in the deletion and insertion arrays was hard.

This means the deletions and insertions members in ChangeSet are gone, and instead there is a changes property which holds an array of Change objects. Each of these has fromA and toA properties indicating its extent in the old document, and fromB and toB properties pointing into the new document. Actual insertions and deletions are stored in inserted and deleted arrays in Change objects, which hold {data, length} objects, where the total length of deletions adds up to toA - fromA, and the total length of insertions to toB - fromB.

When creating a ChangeSet object, you no longer need to pass separate compare and combine callbacks. Instead, these are now represented using a single function that returns a combined data value or null when the values are not compatible.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.1.3

Fixes a bug in the default implementation of Selection.getBookmark.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.1.2

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.1.1

Make sure Safari version detection for clipboard support also works in iOS webview.

entry.title: prosemirror-transform 1.1.0

Transform.getMirror, usable in obscure circumstances for inspecting the mirroring structure or a transform, is now a public method.

New utility function dropPoint, which tries to find a valid position for dropping a slice near a given document position.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.3.5

Bug fixes

Use shared implementation of dropPoint to handle finding a drop position.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.3.4

entry.title: prosemirror-markdown 1.1.0
entry.content:
New features

You can now override the handling of softbreak tokens in a custom handler.

entry.title: prosemirror-dropcursor 1.0.1
entry.content:

Dragging from a content node directly to the outside of the editor will now properly hide the drop cursor.

Make removal of drop cursor part of the drop transaction when possible.

Use dropPoint from prosemirror-transform, rather than a local parallel implementation.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.3.3
entry.content:

Fix issue where a parsing a code block from the editor DOM might drop newlines in the code.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.3.2
entry.content:
Bug fixes

handleKeyDown will now get notified of key events happening directly after a composition ends.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.3.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

The package can now be loaded in a web worker context (where navigator is defined but document isn't) without crashing.

Dropping something like a list item into a textblock will no longer split the textblock.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.5.0

New features

ParseRule.getContent is now passed the parser schema as second argument.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.4.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a regression where DOMParser.parse would fail to apply mark nodes directly at the start of the input.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.4.3
entry.content:

DOMParser.parseSlice can now correctly parses marks at the top level again.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.3.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix mouse-selecting (in IE and Edge) from the end of links and other positions that cause a cursor wrapper.

Widget decorations with the same key are now considered equivalent, even if their other spec fields differ.

New features

The new EditorView.posAtDOM method can be used to find the document position corresponding to a given DOM position.

The new EditorView.nodeDOM method gives you the DOM node that is used to represent a specific node in the document.

Decoration.widget now accepts a function as second argument, which can be used to delay rendering of the widget until the document is drawn (at which point a reference to the view is available).

The getPos function passed to a node view constructor can now be called immediately (it used to return undefined until rendering had finished).

The function used to render a widget is now passed a getPos method that event handlers can use to figure out where in the DOM the widget is.

entry.title: prosemirror-model 1.2.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

rangeHasMark now always returns false for empty ranges.

The DOM renderer no longer needlessly splits mark nodes when starting a non-rendered mark.

New features

DOMSerializer now allows DOM specs for marks to have holes in them, to specify the precise position where their content should be rendered.

The base position parameter to Node.nodesBetween and Fragment.nodesBetween is now part of the public interface.

entry.title: prosemirror-view 1.2.0
entry.content:
Bug fixes

Fix a problem where updating the state of a non-editable view would not set the selection, causing problems when the DOM was updated in a way that disrupted the DOM selection.

Fix an issue where, on IE and Chrome, starting a drag selection in a position that required a cursor wrapper (on a mark boundary) would sometimes fail to work.

Fix crash in key handling when the editor is focused but there is no DOM selection.

Fixes a bug that prevented decorations inside node views with a contentDOM property from being drawn.

Fixes an issue where, on Firefox, depending on a race condition, the skipping over insignificant DOM nodes done at keypress was canceled again before the keypress took effect.

Fixes an issue where an :after pseudo-element on a non-inclusive mark could block the cursor, making it impossible to arrow past it.

New features

The DOM structure for marks is no longer constrained to a single node. Mark views can have a contentDOM property, and mark spec toDOM methods can return structures with holes.

Widget decorations are now wrapped in the marks of the node after them when their side option is >= 0.

Widget decorations may now specify a marks option to set the precise set of marks they should be wrapped in.
